snippet: SCHMIDT--Bernard, 89, passed away January 30th. Beloved husband of Dorothy, devoted father of Michael (Stacie), and the late Lori. Adoring grandfather to Emma and Russell. Proudly served in the United States Navy. Funeral Services to be held February 3rd, 11:15am at "The Riverside" on Amsterdam and 76th St., New York. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SCHMIDT--Bernard, 89, passed away January 30th. Beloved husband of Dorothy, devoted father of Michael (Stacie), and the late Lori. Adoring grandfather to Emma and Russell. Proudly served in the United States Navy. Funeral Services to be held February 3rd, 11:15am at "The Riverside" on Amsterdam and 76th St., New York. 1/3
